jobDescription: A growing medical group in the west Los Angeles area is seeking a Medical Claims Analytics Manager. This talented claims analytics manager will interfaces with department management, department staff and other Plans staff. The analyst will be responsible for generating and mailing invoices to recoup overpaid health benefits, and recovering the overpayments by written correspondence or communication to the members or providers. The Claims Manager will also make claims adjustments in the claims system and process all refund checks. The claims analytics manager must be comfortable working independently and a strong communicator to plan members. This is a great opportunity that can start immediately.  Please send resumes to toby.slagle@rhmr.com
